item.title: The Agile opportunity for Demand Planning Improvements
item.description: Demand planning team going OK / not going OK! A demand planner was recounting how her team was travelling OK but she felt that there was scope for significant improvement. For one thing, she felt that her team’s stakeholders didn’t really know what the team did “beneath the bonnet” and would struggle to explain what value that they added to the business. There was certainly general satisfaction in the team’s output and people would say that that, from the outside, that they were working well together, but that also indicated that stakeholders were somewhat unaware of the internal machinations.
